main.name: Iosif Dobos
main.description: I'm a graduate student at Technology University Dublin with a degree in BSc in Computer Science. I love to build things and discover new technologies. As part of my degree I have built individual and college projects which can be found by clicking the Project button. Also, for more information about work experience, skills and education click on the Resume button.
main.bio: I'm a 4th year computer science student at Technology University Dublin with ICT as my major. I love exploring new technologies and often amazed by the progress we as a human species have made so far in the recent years. This website is developed as part as one of the final year module assignment. The website was developed using ReactJS and hosted on github.io

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: During my internship at Revenue I was involved in three internal projects. Worked in a team to help achieving the goals. Techonology used: Java, Angular JS, JQuery, Jenkis, MongoDB, Apache Tomcat Server, Spring 4

work.company: Adrian Iacob Dry Wall LTD - Dublin
work.title: Supervisor
work.description: Set goals for performance and deadlines in ways that comply with the company plan and vision. Organizing workflow and ensuring that employees understand their duties or delegated tasks. Monitoring employee productivity and providing constructive feedback and coaching.

work.title: Left Middfielder
work.years: 2011 - 2012 FC Bohemians, 2012 - 2013 FC Glasnevin, 2013 - Ongoing FC Real Transilvania
work.description: Taking part in many competitions as part of the club, and training hard to improve my skills and ability. Adapted to the high pressure, extremely competitive environment, and collaborated with team members to achieve team goals.

work.title: Mentor
work.description: The Projectâ€™s goal was to provide favourable conditions for children to learn more and to behave better during summer holiday, included a program of education, culture and arts, set up especially for children with lower financial status. The main responsibility looking after group of children between six and fifteen years of age, researching for a variety of children games and other activities. During mentoring time, helped children to communicate with each other and discover the professional universe they dream of.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Iosif Dobos must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
